items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Leave-In Conditioner is an essential part of the prep process.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Walker Tape®’s Leave-In Conditioner is an essential part of the prep process. It’s designed to help defrizz and rejuvenate your client’s system and bio hair. This color-safe formula is one of the best ways to extend the life of a hair system and keep it looking great.

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly.

With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Close lid tightly.
Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
External use only, do not ingest.
Avoid eye contact.
Keep out of reach of children.
Test on a small area before use.
Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.storedescription:
Spray on hair as needed for a healthier look and feel. Adds moisture and detangles.

To avoid weakening adhesive bonds, do not apply directly to the roots of mesh systems or along hairlines.

We recommend performing a patch test before use.
items.pagetitle: Leave-In Conditioner - 128 fl oz, Gallon | Walker Tape
